data.Title: Google Ads Reporting Outage
data.Description: Google is experiencing an outage affecting Google Ads reporting and some interfaces. The issue is ongoing, and Google is working on a resolution.

data.Title: Reddit Demands Payment for AI Training Data
data.Description: Reddit is blocking search engines like Microsoft Bing from accessing its content unless they pay for the data used in AI model training. Reddit CEO Steve Huffman stated that companies need to compensate them for using their valuable data.

data.Title: Google Search Ranking Volatility
data.Description: Google Search experienced significant ranking volatility throughout July, particularly on July 19th and 26th. This volatility may indicate testing of a new algorithm update or a potential core update.

data.Title: Google Demotes Deepfake Content in Search
data.Description: Google updated its algorithms to demote deepfake content in search results. The company aims to prevent the spread of misleading and harmful AI-generated content, particularly explicit deepfakes.

data.Title: Google Tests Sitelinks Pill Format on Desktop
data.Description: Google is experimenting with a new pill format for sitelinks in desktop search results. This change could impact how users interact with sitelinks and navigate websites.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Introduces "More Found by Google" Reporting
data.Description: Google Merchant Center Next now includes "More found by Google" reporting for product feeds. This feature provides insights into how effectively Google surfaces products from merchants' feeds.

data.Title: Google Knowledge Panels Test "Videos From" Section
data.Description: Google is testing a new "Videos From" section within Knowledge Panels. This addition aims to provide users with more video content related to their search queries.

data.Title: How Google Search Indexes JavaScript: A Report
data.Description: A new report by Vercel and MERJ delves into how Google Search indexes websites built with JavaScript. The study analyzed over 100,000 Googlebot fetches, revealing that Google handles JavaScript effectively, almost on par with traditional web pages.

data.Title: New AI Content Tool: PreWriter
data.Description: PreWriter, a new AI-powered content tool, has been launched to assist writers in researching, creating, and optimizing content for SEO. The tool, developed by Bruce Clay Inc., offers features to enhance content quality and search engine visibility.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Adds New Commute Map Features
data.Description: Microsoft has updated its Bing Android app with new features for the Commute map. Users can now add multiple destinations beyond home and work, enhancing the app's navigation capabilities.

data.Title: Outbrain Acquires Teads in $1 Billion Deal
data.Description: Outbrain has officially acquired Teads in a deal valued at over $1 billion. The acquisition combines two major players in the native advertising space.

data.Title: Google Updates Autocomplete and Predictions Systems
data.Description: Google has made updates to its autocompletion and predictions systems following criticism, potentially related to suggestions involving Donald Trump. The company aims to improve the accuracy and neutrality of its search suggestions.

data.Title: Google Ads Introduces Click-to-WhatsApp Messaging Assets
data.Description: Google Ads now supports click-to-WhatsApp messaging assets, allowing advertisers to directly engage with users on WhatsApp. This feature enhances communication options for businesses using Google Ads.

data.Title: Google Ads Rolls Out Performance Max Reporting Updates and AI Generation Tools
data.Description: Google Ads is introducing updates to Performance Max reporting and adding AI-powered generation tools. These enhancements aim to provide advertisers with more detailed insights and streamline campaign management.

data.Title: Microsoft Advertising Search Ad Revenue Up 19%
data.Description: Microsoft reported a 19% increase in search and advertising revenue, driven by the performance of Microsoft Advertising (formerly Bing Ads). This growth marks a significant quarterly improvement for the company.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Rarely Appear in Trending News Searches
data.Description: A study found that Google's AI Overviews are displayed in only 3.9% of trending news searches. Health-related queries are most likely to trigger AI Overviews, followed by science & tech and local news.

data.Title: Perplexity to Share Ad Revenue with Publishers
data.Description: Following accusations of plagiarism, Perplexity is launching a program to share ad revenue with publishing partners. The AI-powered search engine aims to address concerns about using publishers' content without compensation.

data.Title: Google Mixes Ads into Organic Search Results Infrequently
data.Description: New data reveals that Google mixes ads into organic search results in a very small percentage of searches. Only 0.31% of desktop searches and 0.01% of mobile searches displayed this behavior.

data.Title: Apple Maps Listings Appear in Google SERPs
data.Description: Apple Maps listings are now appearing in Google Search Engine Result Pages (SERPs), potentially impacting local SEO strategies. This integration could influence how users discover and interact with local businesses.

data.Title: Google Advises Against Using M-Dot URLs as Canonical
data.Description: Google's John Mueller reiterates that websites should not designate their mobile (m-dot) URLs as canonical, even with mobile-first indexing fully implemented. This guidance aims to prevent potential issues for large websites.

data.Title: Google Search Console Performance Report Filter Bug
data.Description: Google acknowledges a bug in the Search Console Performance report's Search Appearance filter, preventing all available options from displaying. A fix for this issue is currently in progress.

data.Title: Wix Releases AI Tool for Content Creation and SEO
data.Description: Wix has launched a suite of AI tools designed to automate content creation and enhance organic traffic. The tools aim to help businesses generate authentic content while optimizing for search engines.
